session_summary.primary_mission: Establish registry + adapter SSOT for all Hostinger sites with safe loader/CLI
session_summary.progress: Registry stub created with schema_version and seeded domains; CLI added for list/validate/seed/add; adapter loader added with NoOp fallback; Hostinger adapters mapped by key.

sites_registry.details: Created runtime/control_plane/sites_registry.json with versioned schema and seeded all known Hostinger domains with capabilities disabled by default.

registry_cli.details: Added tools/sites_registry.py supporting list, validate, seed-from-sites-json, add; no behavior change to deploy/post flows.

adapter_loader.details: Added control_plane adapter loader with NoOp fallback; mapped Hostinger adapters (freerideinvestor, prismblossom, weareswarm online/site, tradingrobotplug, ariajet, southwestsecret, dadudekc).

next_actions: Add read-only /sites aggregator in control plane; enrich with health/last_deploy (no writes).
Decide per-site capabilities (blog/deploy/cache) and flip flags manually after review.
Keep credentials in .deploy_credentials/sites.json/.env; registry remains non-secret.
blockers: None for registry; capability enablement pending product/security review.
coordination_needs: Captain/Owner: approve per-site capabilities before enabling deploy/blog/cache flags.
Infra/Agent-3: confirm adapter health checks are acceptable for Hostinger endpoints (timeouts/logging).
key_achievements: Single SSOT registry established for all known Hostinger sites with versioned schema.
Safe adapter loader with NoOp fallback prevents crashes during gradual adoption.
Registry CLI enables controlled additions without touching deploy/post flows.
lessons_learned: Feature-flagged registry adoption avoids SSOT drift and keeps rollback trivial.
NoOp adapters are essential when registry entries may outpace adapter mapping.
swarm_contributions: CLI for consistent site entry management.
Adapter loader mapping for Hostinger sites with safety fallback.

technical_state.registry_state: v1 schema stubbed; seeded domains; capabilities disabled.
technical_state.adapter_state: Hostinger adapters mapped; loader added; NoOp fallback ready.

handoff_notes.priority: Add read-only /sites aggregator; set capabilities after review.
handoff_notes.immediate_action: Run python tools/sites_registry.py validate; choose capability flags per site; optionally seed from sites.json if new domains are added.
handoff_notes.coordination: Captain/Owner to approve capabilities; Infra to sign off on health-check approach.
handoff_notes.session_cleanup: Pending devlog + Discord post + swarm_brain update
